name: Hero Survival (Dolphin Dev)
description:
You are in control of a hero and your main goal is to survive this never ending procedurally generated dungeon! 

Each time you enter an unique dungeon, you have to fight your way through multiple of enemies to reach the fountain!

Using this fountain you can go to the shop to replenish your health and purchase more bombs!

Have good adventures, traveler!

Controls

Movement - WASD

Sprint - Left Shift

Interact - E

Drop bombs - Q

Attacking - Left Mouse

Credits

Custom Font by: Hewett Tsoi,  https://www.dafont.com/alagard.font

Custom texture pack used: https://www.gamedev.tv/p/2d-rpg-simple-sprites

Made by yt.com/DolphinDev - check out the YouTube channel for more indie game development content!
